mapper.select: select pl.postno, pl.cateno, pl.posttitle, pl.postcontent, pl.regdate from post pl, (select pn.cateno from post pn, ( SELECT max(postNo) as postNo FROM post p, category c where p.cateno = c.cateno and c.id = #{id} ) p where pn.postNo = p.postNo) cn where pl.cateNo = cn.cateno order by pl.postno desc

select p.postno, p.cateno, p.posttitle, p.postcontent, p.regdate from post p, ( SELECT max(postNo) as postNo FROM post p, category c where p.cateno = c.cateno and c.id = #{id} ) pn where p.postNo = pn.postno
